channel.title: Shop Help - Please Look
channel.description:
Hey, i finally made my own custom shop using the fairy queen npc, added stuff like hween masks, shields, godswords etc.. when i go to buy something it says "You do not have enough tokkul" How do i change it so it requires GP not tokkul?
Thanks, Jake

item.title: Shop Help - Please Look
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

You should see something like this in your ShopAssistant Class:

				if(Slot1 == -1 && c.myShopId == SHOP_ID) {
					c.sendMessage("You don't have enough tokkul.");
					break;
				}

Change the shop ID’s to your pleasing.

Read full topic
